defitem.label: Funding:
defitem.item: Web version of the finding aid funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities.

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.abstract: The collection contains three poems, two by George Arnold, and one by William Winter.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Poems by George Arnold, 1863 and n.d., Accession #11117, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The poems were transferred from the Rare Book Division on 1 June 1993. "To the Waves" was removed from Rare Book Division copy of Drift: a seashore idyl and other poems. [Barrett PS1039.A7D7 1866] "The Matron Year" and "George Arnold" were tipped in Rare Book Division copy of Drift: seashore idyl and other poems. [Barrett PS1039.A7D7 1866]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection contains three poems: "To the Waves" and "The Matron Year" by Arnold, and "George Arnold" by William Winter with a signed note to Richard Stoddard.

did.unittitle: "To the Waves," by George Arnold 1863 September 15
"The Matron Year," by George Arnold n.d.

scopecontent.p: Poem is accompanied by a note.
Poem is accompanied by a signed note to Richard Stoddard.
